metadata.description: Context Engineering skills for building production-grade AI agent systems

plugins.name: context-engineering-skills
plugins.description: Core context engineering skills covering fundamentals, degradation patterns, compression, optimization, multi-agent patterns, memory systems, tool design, evaluation, and project development

plugins.name: example-skills
plugins.description: Complete example implementations demonstrating context engineering principles including digital brain PKM, book SFT pipeline, and LLM-as-Judge evaluation system
